QuestData.Title: The Eternal Palace: Queen's Gambit
QuestData.Description: We have opened the way to the palace. We must end this.$b$bQueen Azshara is the most powerful sorceress in existence. She mastered magics thousands of years before our archmagi were even born.$b$bStill, we must prevail. If not, she and her dark patron will remake all of Azeroth to their desires.$b$bChampion, we must defeat Azshara. Are you with us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Queen Azshara in the Eternal Palace.
